channel.title: People can't connect to my server? eclipse 639 client
channel.description: When my friend tries to start the client for my server (eclipse 639) it won't load past 1%. I tried to portforward the best I could but I could probably use some help with that. But if there are any other possible things that could be causing this problem please let me know. thanks.

item.title: People can't connect to my server? eclipse 639 client
item.dc:creator: @99rangek0 99rangek0
item.description:
@99rangek0 wrote:

Make sure everything is right on no-ip.org and that you have the program loaded up.
if that doesn’t work you probably didn’t portforward correctly.

If you think its the client and you port forwarded correctly, download a random client (and new source to test if needed) and see if your friend can log in through a different client.

Read full topic
item.source: People can't connect to my server? eclipse 639 client

item.title: People can't connect to my server? eclipse 639 client
item.dc:creator: @dawgsays123 dawgsays123
item.description:
@dawgsays123 wrote:

Do you mean when you edit runeclipse639.bat and change the i.p 0.0.0.0 to my ip duphascape.no-ip.biz

item.title: People can't connect to my server? eclipse 639 client
item.dc:creator: @99rangek0 99rangek0
item.description:
@99rangek0 wrote:

is the ip on the client automatically going to your server? (example.no-ip.org) or is it going to 127.0.0.1 ?
